CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Clear Channel Outdoor Holdings Inc is one of the world's largest outdoor advertising companies. The company is engaged in providing advertising opportunities through billboards, street furniture displays, transit displays, and other out-of-home advertising displays for its clients. Its reportable segment includes America's outdoor advertising and International outdoor advertising. The company generates most of its revenue from America's outdoor advertising.
